#include<iostream>
#include<vector>
#include<cstdio>
using namespace std;

vector<bool> bn[100002];

unsigned long long int powermod(unsigned long long int r, unsigned long long int b, int i){
    unsigned long long int res = r;
    for(int j=bn[i].size()-1;j>=0;j--){
        res = (res * 2LL) % b;
        if(bn[i][j]==1){
            res = (res + r) % b;
        }
    }
    return res;
}

int main(){
    int i,j,n,t;
    unsigned long long int aux,b,c,r,k;
    for(i=0;i<=100000;i++){
        j=i;
        while(j>1){
            bn[i].push_back(j%2);
            j=j/2;
        }
    }
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--){
        scanf("%d %llu", &n, &b);
        //cout<<n<<" "<<b<<endl;
        if(n<=1){
            if(b==1){
                printf("Odd\n");
            }
            else{
                printf("Even\n");
            }
        continue;
        }
        r = 1LL;
        c = b*2LL;
        for(i=2;i<=n;i++){
            r = powermod(r, c, i);
        }
        if(r>=b){
            printf("Odd\n");
        }
        else{
            printf("Even\n");
        }
    }
}
